attributes.additional_details:
1To give a sense of pride to each individual, irrespective of colour, creed or religion, for the country in which we live  Thereby creating a strong National identity.

2 To supplement the armed forces, emergency services, public transport and other services that the government provides. Also providing more resources to aid in the recovery from international disasters.

3 To give on the job training and qualifications to the unemployed youth of today with the aim of building a stronger back bone to the country for the future. They are our future.

4 To build a nation of citizens with self-respect, discipline and a better sense of community and teamwork.
